  "id": "org-001",
  "name": "West Charlotte High Summer Meal",
  "alternate_name": "",
  "description": "from 06-16-2025 to 08-08-2025.\nAll kids and teens ages 18 and under can eat for free.\nSome meal sites may ask for registration to receive meals\nFamilies can receive $120 in SUN Bucks grocery-buying benefits per eligible school-aged child on a debit-like card to buy nutritious food during the summer at grocery stores, farmers markets and some online retailers. Learn more and find out if your child is eligible at ncdhhs.gov/SUNBucks.\nThe supervisor is Darryl Reid  (tel: (980) 343-3440).",
